articles.title: G20 summit in South Africa adopts declaration despite U.S. boycott and opposition - CBS News
articles.description: South Africa promoted it as a victory for the first G20 summit to be held in Africa and its aim to put problems, especially affecting poor countries, at the top of the agenda.
articles.content: World leaders from the Group of 20 rich and developing economies broke with tradition and adopted a declaration at the start of their summit in South Africa on Saturday despite opposition from the Un… [+5466 chars]
